physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially believed to have migraine headaches, later recognized as tension-type headaches.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked improvement noted following botulinum toxin injections.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Ms T noted fewer headaches, less disability, and a decrease in medication use after the injections.
Tenderness escalated with increasing frequency and severity of headaches.
